properties.entry: SELECT M_NO ,M_NAME ,M_ID ,M_NICKNAME ,M_PWD ,M_RRN ,M_PHONE ,M_EMAIL ,M_ADDRESS ,M_DATE ,M_MODIFY ,M_STATUS ,M_REPORT ,M_GRADE ,M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ? AND M_PWD = ? AND M_STATUS = 'U'
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_NICKNAME = ? , M_PHONE = ? , M_EMAIL = ? , M_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE M_ID = ?

SELECT M_NO , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_PWD , M_RRNM_ID , M_PHONE , M_EMAIL , M_ADDRESS , M_DATE , M_MODIFY , M_STATUS , M_REPORT , M_GRADE , M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ? AND M_STATUS = 'U'
